merchant.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who buys and sells goods in large quantities
merchant.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the son of a wealthy merchant
merchant.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a person or organization that buys and sells goods or a particular type of goods
merchant.translation[1].definitions[0].e: US tobacco merchants are depending more and more on international sales.
merchant.translation[1].definitions[1].d: used by CREDIT CARD companies to talk about the shops etc that accept their cards
merchant.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Today, over 18 million merchants accept Visa.
